short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let's make peace with ads, we loved ad :)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Since 2024/7 update, the detection mechanism has added some ads that can't be skipped too quickly. Although all the details haven't been fully figured out, this version is still working quite well at the moment. ðŸ¤Ÿ

======

A fast, lightweight, and undetectable YouTube Ads Blocker for Chrome.

This extension is designed to monitor and automatically skip advertisements on YouTube and YouTube Music.

FEATURES:
- [x] Skippable ad at the video's start, midway, or at the end.
- [x] Ads visible on the contents.
- [x] Support youtube music.
- [x] Skip disable plugin waring.
- [x] Only hide e-commerce ad on video.
- [x] Darken the ads in the video a bit.

Install now and enjoy YouTube and YouTube Music the way it was meant to beâ€”ad-free!

It just a side project, and it also open source 
https://github.com/tianci-sh/BreezeAds

Enjoy it :)
